subject: Doping (Sports)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong said in an e-mail that he would be spending quiet time with his family before deciding what will be next on his to-do list, which antidoping officials hope is testifying.
snippet: Lance Armstrong said in an e-mail that he would be spending quiet time with his family before deciding what will be next on his to-do list, which antidoping officials hope is testifying.
